name: In the Interest of R.J.T., a Minor. Petition of R.T., (Natural Mother)

parties: In the Interest of R.J.T., a Minor. Petition of R.T., (Natural Mother).

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of June, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the Superior Court erred in determining the trial court abused its discretion in denying CYF’s permanency goal change request from reunification to adoption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Interest of R.J.T., a Minor. Petition of R.T., (Natural Mother).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 16, 2010.
